data.title: Muslim community tipped off Canada about terror plot
Canadian Muslim groups take hard stance against terror plotters; "You have nothing to do with our faith"
China states it will never use nuclear weapons against Japan
5 Hour Secret Meeting between WikiLeaks Founder and Google Chairman Eric Schmidt

Fearing corruption, Hong Kongers reject sending aid to China quake victims. Hong Kong residents recall the $1.2 billion they sent to Sichuan after the 2008 quake that wound up paying for government banquets.
Assad attacked rebels with nerve gas, top IDF analyst says. Based on photo evidence, regime deployed sarin on March 19; over 1,000 tons of chemical weapons in Syria.
Mars One is now accepting applications for one-way trips to the planet Mars.
John A. Boehner received $2.57 million to vote yes on CISPA.
Student seeking Kyoto flat told: No foreigners allowed - The Japan Times
